feature.label: Ebean Enhancer
feature.description:
Enables the Ebean enhancement to occur when you save in Eclipse IDE.
You would typically use this plugin rather than configuring a javaagent or using an ANT task (although you can use all three together if you wish).
* Fast CODE - SAVE/COMPILE - RUN/TEST cycles during development without having to configure a javaagent
* You enable/disable enhancement on a per-project basis (project - right mouse - Toggle Ebean Enhancement)
* you can adjust the debugging levels using preferences (window - preferences - Ebean)
